WorkItem.Description: Support implicit/explicit conversion operators, ideally without any extra configuration steps.  Support these in testing mappings as well.

Comments.Message: Presumably this refers to not being required to make calls to CreateMap<T>(S, D). I want to use this product but it seems unfortunate that you need to manually define maps when that could be calculated automatically the first time that a call is made to Map<T>.

Patches are always welcome!  And as for waiting for the first time to call Map<T>, check out DynamicMap.  It creates the map the first time.  Of course, you lose configuration validation, which pretty much relegates that feature to anonymous types IMO.
